SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
I beseech you, O Dismal King!
Return life to my master in exchange
for my body's blood!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Man, this door thing is HEA-VY!
And looks like I'm in...uh, a graveyard?
Well, no wonder the thing was so heavy—
it was a tombstone! Can't say I love emerging from a grave,
but I guess we'll see how it goes.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
My master lives once more! All hail
the Dismal King! I, Dolores, swear here
and now that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
I see your head has found its way back upon
your shoulders, Master! Also, you seem to have
been restored to a younger self—more blessings
from the Dismal King, to be certain. Now rest easy, for I, Dolores, shall
serve you as we work to restore the
Dismal King himself!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Er, sorry. Who are you?
And what's this whole 'Dismal King'
thing you keep going on about?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Goodness! It seems this resurrection
has left your memory scrambled. But worry not, for I, your loyal servant
Dolores, will aid you with anything
and everything your heart desires.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
You're gonna help me? Wow, thanks!
So my name is—

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Oh! How strange it is for you to introduce
yourself to me, Master! Also, sort of...
disturbing, I guess? Thankfully, we just need a little shock
to the system to restore those memories,
so let's go see the wardens of the
watchtowers who took your life!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Guess she thinks I'm her murdered master.
Seems weird I'd look so much like her,
but meh! I'll just roll with it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Come, Master!
The first tower awaits!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.text:
Oh! How strange it is for you to introduce
yourself to me, Master! Well, if we want to
get your memories back, we've no choice but
to retrace your steps. And while I understand your being hesitant
to remember the moment you were brutally
beheaded, there's, um...not really another
option. Sorry!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.text:
Time to get going, then!
We're off to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
I beseech you, O Dismal King!
Return life to my master in exchange
for my precious ring, which I offer
now unto the Well of Desires!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text: I can't see a thing in here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Exceeept... Yeah, that corner there is
reddish black and round like a little sun.
Maybe if I head towards that...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh wow! I thought this was a black sun,
but it's actually the mouth of a well—
and it looks like someone threw this
round little ring into it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
My master lives once more! All hail the
Dismal King! I, Dolores, swear here and
now that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text: Uh, hi there. This your ring?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
It guided me here, which is the only
reason I made it out of that well.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Do you not recognize me, Master?
I am your loyal servant, Dolores!
Did the shock of being so brutally
murdered truly make you forget!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Uhhh, I think you're mistaking me
for someone else. I just came here
to look for cats.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Greedy_Man
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Well, well! If it ain't Dolores! Bet I'd be
sittin' pretty with the wardens of the
watchtowers if I were to capture ya!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bloodthirsty_Woman
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh, she caused a commotion at the towers,
all right—but I bet we'd be sittin' even
PRETTIER if we also gave 'em the weird
chick who just popped out of the well!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Nice to know popping out of wells
is weird in this world, too.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh, but this is grim indeed, Master!
These foul people intend to sell you
off to the wardens of the watchtowers!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Yeah, and they don't seem keen to negotiate,
either. Well, let's see how they feel after
a little dose of Ameya the Witch!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Greedy_Man
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Just climbed out of a well and already
lookin' for a fight? Well, bring it on,
'cause I'll put ya right back in the
ground where ya came from!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bloodthirsty_Woman
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Corpse pays as much as a prisoner,
so let's just kill 'em all!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Ugh. I'm never gonna be able to look
for cats if all these weirdos keep
getting up in my face.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh, indeed, Master—so instead, let's go to
the watchtowers and claim the keys to the
Dark Castle! This will all be resolved once
the Dismal King is restored, you see.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text: Sounds good to me. Lead the way!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
I can feel something in these ruins,
and each time I pray to the Dismal
King, the feeling becomes stronger.
Something...is coming.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
It's pitch dark here. I can't see— OW!
Dang it, I keep tripping on all this rubble
or whatever it is. But I hear a voice over
there, so I guess I'll just head for it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
My master is returned to me!
Huzzah! All hail the Dismal King!
I, Dolores, swear here and now
that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Oh man, I would have been wandering
around in there forever if you hadn't
called out to me. Thanks so much!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Oh, I am not the one responsible, Master.
I implored the Dismal King every day,
and he at last saw fit to hear my prayers.
He made it so you would hear my voice!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
First, I'm not your master.
Second, who's the Dismal King?
Third, wait. Hold on. Are you saying the leader of this world
has the power to bring people back from
the dead? 'Cause that sounds like
something out of a faerie tale.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
...What are you talking about, Master?
Ah, I see! The shock of being brought back
to life must have you confused. I understand,
and do not worry, for Dolores is at your side!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Well, guess I'll leave everything to you, then.
Seems like that's the best course of action
until I'm used to this place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Let's start by heading for the Dark Castle
where the Dismal King resides. We won't
be able to get inside, but I still want to
offer up some words of thanks.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Hey, I get it—it's definitely important
to thank the people who've helped you.
Well then, let's get going!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text: So this is the Dark Castle, huh?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
O Dismal King, thank you for returning my
master to me! I beg of you, please wait
just a little longer, that we might see you
restored to your former glory once more!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text: Is this some sort of seal?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
I think the seal will be broken
if we put something in it...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
Correct, Master! Each of the four wardens
of the watchtowers has hidden a key—
keys you died trying to acquire.
Er... Do you remember that?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
Blech! These wardens must be real
pieces of work if they're living in
those nasty-looking towers.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
They are all terrible louts to the last!
So while we must get the keys from them,
we should avoid any head-on clashes.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
I'm not really big on complicated plans,
but sure, let's give it a shot.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.text:
They are all terrible louts to the last.
And since we need the keys anyway,
we should go kill every last one
of the miserable dastards!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
I sit at the cusp of death, so starved am I!
Have you no thoughts at all as you gaze
upon my sallow, emaciated form?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
B-but we slaughtered an entire pig so
you might eat, milord! 'Tis all we had!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
You believe such a trifle could restore
my body to its full robustness? Pah! Well, if there is naught else to eat,
I've no choice but to consume you.
Though I'd hoped for something rather
more nutritious...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Begging your pardon, milord, but I am
with child. I beg of you, spare us
from the stewpot until he is born.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
A BABY!? Why didn't you fools
lead with that!? I will spare you today—but you must bring me
the child as soon as it is born. For unlike
the tough, bitter skins of adults,
newborn babe is soft and tender.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, thank the heavens!
We survived another month.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
I wonder what my next tribute will be.
Pah! I am mere moments from wasting
away to skin and bone!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
That's the Warden of Gluttony, one of the
watchtower wardens with a key to the Dark
Castle. Despite eating everything he can get
his hands on, he's constantly hungry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
And he killed me when I tried to get
my hands on his key last time, right?
Let's not have that happen again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text: Of course, Master. Let's do that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Of course, Master. Let's do thaaa...
Er, wait. Why? If we just 'march in,' 
you're going to get killed again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Because I wanna ask him about the key!
Look, it'll be fine. If we have to fight,
we'll just figure it out.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
How honorable you are, Master! I mean,
it's a stupid way to go about things,
but I rather like that about you.
Now lead on and I shall follow!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
EEEK! Please, spare our miserable lives!
We've nothing else to give, I swear!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, we're not with the Tower of Gluttony!
We just need to get the warden's key to
the Dark Castle. Do you guys happen
to know anything useful about him?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
A key to... Wait, are you trying to help
the Dismal King!? Oh, bless you, miss!
If he were back, we'd no longer have to
toil under the cruel yoke of the wardens!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Alas, I fear we know very little about the
Warden of Gluttony, save that his hunger
cannot be slaked and he hoards more food
than any being could possibly consume.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, and he also enjoys uncommon food,
especially if he's never tasted it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
So either lots of food or rare food, huh?
Yeah, I bet we'd be able to get into the
tower if we had one of those things. Thanks, you two! Oh, and I hope your
baby's born happy and healthy and
just cute as a button!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Let's just forget we even met her.
It will be better that way.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
So we need either lots of food,
or some kind of uncommon food.
Where should we go?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
There's a livestock farm at the far end
of this town where meat is plentiful.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
And they're just going to hand it over to us?
Man, people here are super nice.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Oh man, there's dead pigs everywhere!
That's pretty gross, actually.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Sadly, the plague is ever spreading.
If not for your sake, Master,
I'd never come to such a place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Hey, so this might sound super weird,
but we've come for your pigs.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Well, that's the best damn news I've
heard all week! Take 'em all! But for god's sake, don't eat the things.
They'll kill you ten times before you
even hit the ground.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Yeah, there is absolutely ZERO chance
that I was planning to do that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
So we feed the dead pigs
to the Warden of Gluttony?
A brilliant plan, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Yeah, I think I might be a genius. Still,
I'm not keen on carrying all this dead hog
by myself, so do you mind lending a hand?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Well, we're at the Tower of Gluttony.
What next, Master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: I hide in the meat and sneak inside!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: Let's offer the meat and negotiate.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Boy, I really should have thought this
plan through instead of just blurting
it out like that... Well, nothing for it now. On the count
of three, we're diving into the pigs!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
I will go anywhere you go, Master!
Even into a steamy pile of rotting meat!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
The Warden of Gluttony is not one for
negotiation, Master; I fear this plan
will end with your death once again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Yeah, so by 'negotiate,' I actually mean
'stuff the guy full of rotted pig until he wants
to hurl and then start demanding stuff.'

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Oh! Well, that'll likely work out great.
Brilliant thinking, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Ah, I see my next offering has come.
Now what awaits me this day? Can it be!? Rotten meat—and in such great
quantities! Oh, but tonight will be an
evening of bliss for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
*chomp* *munch* *horf* *snarfle*
This smell! This flavor! This texture!
Nothing in all the world can match it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Wow. I mean, I've seen some stuff
in my day, but wow. But hey, let's look for the key
while we've got the chance!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Did the couple from before send this?
I may have underestimated them—the
foul rottenness of this meal is truly
a thing beyond all compare!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
And what a feast! I eat and eat and eat,
but there is yet more! Oho ho ho!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: I found the key, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Perfect! Now let's hop, skip, and run
outta here like our butts are on fire. Ugh. I don't think my nose is ever
gonna work right again...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text: I've brought you a tribute, Warden.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Rotten meat—and in such great quantities!
Oh, but you are a fine one indeed—
and such dedication deserves a reward.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
How about you chow down first
and we talk rewards later?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Why, I'm liking you more and more!
If only everyone was so thoughtful. But instead, I find myself surrounded by
cretins and fools who simply refuse to
understand or anticipate my needs! Also, this meat is simply divine.
I've never tasted its like before.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
It is in fact from pigs that died
in a plague, my good sir.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
PLAGUEMEAT!? Oho ho ho ho!
How truly succulent!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Man, this guy really lives up to
his name—doesn't care if the meat's
diseased or rotten or whatever! But okay, he's snarfing it down.
So now what?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Remember how you mentioned something
about a reward? Well, I'll take one key
to the Dark Castle, please!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Strange... There was an idiot who died trying
to collect all the keys a little while ago.
Are you perhaps associated with that moron?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Well, either way, my key will do you no good
without the other three, so I'll let the other
wardens worry about that while I gorge myself
on this positively mouth-watering meat! The key is yours.
Best of luck, now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Ah, while your meal was mouth-watering,
I can't simply hand my key over to anyone
who wanders by with diseased meat. Sadly, I suppose there's nothing for it
but to kill you—but this little workout
will make my next meal all the sweeter!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Think there's uncommon food
in this well, maybe?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh, indeed! In fact, this well will let you
get your hands on food that would never be
found in this world otherwise. Oh, and sometimes you'll find garbage,
though I imagine the Warden of Gluttony
doesn't really care which one he gets.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Maybe this well connects to other worlds?
Seems like it's worth a shot.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
I think I got something.
Let's see here...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text: Oh, lucky! An item! I'll take that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Heh. I bet the Warden of Gluttony
is gonna LOVE this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text: I brought you a tribute, Warden!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Now THERE'S something I've never seen...
Why, it looks positively delicious!
Give it to me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh ho, but it simply melts in the mouth!
While food is best savored in one's stomach,
I am hardly one to shake a stick at doing so
on the tongue as well. Now then, I believe you've earned
a reward for bringing me something so
unusual and delicious.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Great! Well then, how about you give
me your key to the Dark Castle?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Do you truly believe this meal was
valuable enough to warrant my key?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh, I like you. I didn't think there was
anyone else in this world who understood
food on the same level as myself, but then
you arrived with the soul of a gourmand!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Very well, you may have my key. Be aware,
however, it won't do you any good without
the other three—and I don't expect the other
wardens to be so generous as I. But that is their problem! As for myself,
I shall now immerse myself even further
into a world of a succulent gourmet!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Hubris! Cheek! Impudence!
No meal could possibly be so valuable! Sadly, I suppose there's nothing for it
but to kill you—but this little workout
will make my next meal all the sweeter!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I've got something to ask you, Warden:
why'd you lock up the Dismal King?
I mean, isn't he, like...your leader?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
And who are you to be asking such things!?
If you would speak with me, manners and protocol
dictate that you must provide tribute in the
form of delicious foodstuffs!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
You there! Maid! You look terribly familiar...
Were you not the servant of the woman who
came here to steal the key to the Dark Castle?
The woman we later decapitated?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
My master lives again thanks to the power of
the Dismal King—and this time, we are going
to take the key and use it to release him!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
The Dismal King brought her back?
No. Impossible. Absolutely impossible! What's more, the Dismal King has locked
HIMSELF up in the Dark Castle—we are
simply taking guardianship of the keys
so as to ensure he is not disturbed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
A bald-faced lie! I know the keys have
been scattered and hidden away!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Well, we'll know the truth once we see
the Dismal King—so gimme that key!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I am not in the habit of giving anything
to interlopers who arrive before me
without proper tribute! And so, I propose a challenge.
If you win, I'll give you the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Nice! I LOVE challenges!
So what are we doing here?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
A battle of the bulging belly!
We shall eat and eat and eat,
and the side who eats the most
shall be declared the victor!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
The Warden of Gluttony wants an
EATING contest!? That's just low.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
This is the Tower of Gluttony!
What other challenge would you
expect given our current setting? Oh, and if you lose, your lives will
be most deliciously forfeited to me.
Now...I would have your answer.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Let's chow down!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Here's a better idea: FIIIGHT!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Make sure your larder is stocked,
because I'm about to eat you out
of house and home!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: S-such confidence...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Are you certain about this, Master?
Think about who your opponent is!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Yeah, I definitely need to take care
of some things first—and to start,
let's go someplace with tons of people!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Um... Okay?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_1.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_1.text:
My key was stolen, but no matter. Right now,
I must focus on eating something to heal
the wounds upon my mind and body.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Lots of people live in this town,
but I doubt any of them will be
willing to stand up to the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Yeah, because they're all hungry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Hey, everybody! Listen up! There's gonna
be a huge feast at the Tower of Gluttony,
and you're all invited to come chow down!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
That pig of a warden is holding
a feast for US? I can't believe it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
It's all first-come, first-serve, so hurry
on over there before the food runs out!
I mean, who knows when that guy will
ever treat us like this again?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: I'm in!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Me too!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Hey, wait for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Well, this has taken a turn!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Ah, welcome! I commend you for standing
and fighting our battle even though it 
is destined to end with you in my belly.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Nice attitude for a guy who's about to lose
to a tiny little witch girl. Now let's get
this food battle on the road already!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Whoooa, look at all that food! I had no
idea the warden had such generosity!
NOW LET ME AT IT!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Ho, what are you doing!?
This is a one-on-one battle!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: IS it, though? 'Cause you never said anything about that. Also, you clearly said our LIVES would be yours if you won—as in, lives PLURAL. Sure sounds like a team sport to me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
You deceived me...but it is no matter!
For I am the Warden of Gluttony,
and none can hope to best me on
the battlefield of food!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: This looks amazing!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: I'm gonna eat till I croak!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Hmph! You people are mere food tourists!
A hundred of you filthy urchins could not
outeat true food nobility such as myself!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
This is the first time I've ever eaten
so much, and I'm so happy I could die.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Not me! I want dessert! DESSEEERT!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: My compliments to the chef!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Why not just give up already?
I have barely begun to dine!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
We've only had a hundred people eat so far,
and I've got 300 more waiting outside for
their turn at the table. You better hang
in there so everyone can get their fill!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Y-yes, well, I could eat three TIMES
this amount with...no problem...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Boy, you sure do live up to your name. But you
might want to think about quitting, because
we've got a hundred people left and I haven't
even taken a bite yet!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I've only...begun to feast...
I...I will devour...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
You know, you should really
treat your body like a temple.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Don't make me lau— HURK!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Don't look, don't look!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Good news is that we got the key.
Bad news is that I smell TERRIBLE.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I smell nothing but your
own magnificence, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I hear you two were married in secret.
Congratulations! From two lives,
a new one is created. But why keep such a
wondrous thing secret?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You didn't want to pay the marriage tax.
Ah, but it's a pity to tarnish the sacred
act of marriage with such behavior. Still, I am a forgiving man. Your marriage
will be considered legal and binding so
long as you pay the tax by this evening.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Um, and by marriage tax,
do you mean...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
One night of service to me, yes.
The bride? The groom? Both? I care not.
You're free to make that decision yourselves.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I COULD order you to do this, as one cannot
oppose the power of a warden. But this service
is sacred, and coercion is an ugly thing that
does not suit me. Think carefully upon your decision.
I shall be waiting.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And now to decide what kind of service
they shall provide... Oh, just thinking
about it gives me chills! Hss hss hss!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
That's the Warden of Lust, Master.
While he tries to hold a polite and
composed facade, his head is filled
with all manner of desirous thoughts. He's also one of the watchtower wardens
who holds a key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
And he killed me when I tried to get
my hands on his key last time, right?
Let's not have that happen again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text: Of course, Master. Let's do that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Of course, Master. Let's do thaaa...
Er, wait. Why? If we just 'march in,' 
you're going to get killed again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Well, the easiest way to learn about the
key would be to pick his brain, so... Oh!
We'll say we came to pay the marriage tax!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Marriage... W-wait, you mean ME!? I mean, US!?
The two of us, a happily married couple!?
That's... Oh, but what am I to do!?
My mind is a complete blank...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
We'll just be PRETENDING, Dolores.
Sheesh. You're gonna make it awkward
if you keep acting like that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
EEEK! Wait, please! We didn't say
anything about running away!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
If you're going to take her,
then just take her already!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yes, just take... Wait, WHAT!?
Are you planning to sacrifice
me so you can escape alone!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
We're not with the Tower of Lust—we just need
to get the Warden's key to the Dark Castle.
Do you happen to know anything useful?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
A key to... Wait, are you trying to help
the Dismal King!? Oh, bless you, miss!
If he were back, we'd no longer have to
toil under the cruel yoke of the wardens!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Alas, the Warden of Lust has a truly terrifying
power: when he stares at you with his shining,
snake-like eyes, you've no choice but to do
exactly as he bids of you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, except for that dog. You know,
the one who bit him? The Warden held
no sway whatsoever over that animal. That said, I don't wish to think about what
happened to the poor dog afterward, just as
I cannot stand to think about what might
happen to me in a similar situation!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Okay, so he can make people obey him,
but the power doesn't work on non-humans? That's great, thank you! Oh, and congrats
on your wedding—I hope your marriage is
filled with happiness!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
So this guy's got the power to make people
obey him, huh? Doesn't sound like much
compared to a witch's power, but probably
trouble enough all the same.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
I agree, although I don't understand
why he didn't just use that power
on the newlyweds.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
He's probably a perv who loves watching
people squirm when they know they can't
refuse him. Talk about disgusting!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
Well, I suppose we should start
looking for a dog.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
Then we get it to bite the warden and
look for the key while he's occupied?
You're sharp as a tack, Dolores!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Hey there, Warden. We've come to
pay our marriage tax.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
What!? I had no idea there were
people out there who might pay
my tax of their own volition!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Er, forgive me. I was so overjoyed to find people
who understand and appreciate the true meaning
of the marriage tax that I couldn't help but
exclaim in surprise. I offer my blessings unto your union, and am
glad you understand that the marriage tax
is a gift from me to the pair of you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Appreciate it, fella.
So how do we pay this deal?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Oh, I will accept a service from
either of you beautiful brides.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: I'll just wait here then.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Right this way, my dear!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Find the key quickly... Please.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: I will! I promise!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Okay, so where do I start?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Passage on the right.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Passage on the left.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Passage straight ahead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Dang! No key! I gotta hurry
this up for Dolores's sake!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Not here either. And yeah, I doubt the
warden would jump straight to using his
power, but Dolores is gonna be in big
trouble whenever he decides to.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Where is this stupid key!? Ugh.
The guy must keep it on him.
I gotta get back!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Now then, my dear, let me see
that beautiful body of yours.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Beautiful? Me? Oh, no sir!
Just a plain old body over here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Why, that's not true at all!
The body of each and every
bride is a beautiful thing.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
So you're saying I'm exactly the same as all
the other brides!? You brought me all the
way up here and THAT'S what you tell me!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I... Er, I mean... Of course not!
You are wholly unique and special!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Ugh! This woman is a real pain.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Perhaps a drink, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Don't mind if I do!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: You must feel better now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Oh, that was just delicious.
I'll have another, please!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Er... I mean, of course!
Have as many as you like!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: This one's not normal...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I did not realize you were the
troublesome type, my dear one.
I prefer a more...obedient bride.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Well, if I'm not what you're looking for,
I suppose I'll just chalk this all up to
irreconcilable differences and head home.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
All right, this has gone on long enough!
I command you to gaze into my eyes
and beg for my favor!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
No way! Not interested in staring
into your beady little eyes, mister!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Ah, but closing your eyes is futile...
You cannot escape my power...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: M-Master...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Oh, but I can escape it. I very, very much can.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Henchman_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Halt, stranger! I'm under strict
orders not to let anyone into the
warden's private chambers!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Oh yeah? Thanks for the info.
Now I know I'm in the right place!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: What's with all the commotion?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Dolores! You okay!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Yes, Master, I'm perfectly fine!
Did you find the key to the Dark Castle?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
The key to the... Hss hss hss! Oh, but it's
all coming together now. I KNEW I recognized
this bride—you're that maid from before!
But your master is said to be deceased.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
By the power of the Dismal King has she
been returned to life—and we'll be taking
that key so we can aid in his return!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Hss hss hss! Oh, how VERY interesting!
But let us discuss this like civilized
people—what do you need the key for? Depending on your answer,
I just might let you have it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: I'm looking for something.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
No way! You're gonna pay
for how you treated Dolores!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I'm looking for something, and I
think the Dismal King can help.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
How utterly fascinating. This sounds far
more fun than any service which that maid
or bride or...whatever she is might offer.
You may take the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I'm quite looking forward to what you
will encounter in the Dark Castle...
Now begone before I change my mind!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Just who IS that woman?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_100_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_100_C.text:
I'm surprised the woman lost her temper
over my treatment of a maid. Who IS she?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Is your plan to try and
catch a wolf, Master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Yeah, I think the wolf idea is our best play.
Also, how cool is it gonna look to waltz into
enemy territory with a freakin' WOLF!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Hi there! Scuse me! Have you seen a wolf
around here? I'm trying to catch one.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Sorry, you want to CATCH it?
That sounds sort of impossible.
Also, no. I haven't seen one.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Well, boo. I was hoping to set the wolf on the
Warden of Lust and then look for the key to
the Dark Castle while he was getting chomped,
but I guess I'll need another plan.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Wait, hold on. You're planning to release
the Dismal King? Let me help you!
I've got something I need to ask him!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Well, I'm glad for the help, but...
Wait, HOW are you helping, exactly?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
I'm a wolf tamer, actually—so if you
need one brought to the Tower of Lust,
I am your man.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Well, why didn't you just say so!?
In that case, I'll head to the tower.
Make sure you bring the wolf, okay!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Dude, come on. Where's the wolf?
I mean, you had ONE job!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, don't worry.
It'll come as soon as I call.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
I will have the groom
provide services to me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: How we doing on the wolf?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, don't worry.
It'll come as soon as I call.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Now let me see that well-muscled
body of yours, groom.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
You know, I'd heard the Warden of Lust
was a man of rare beauty, but you're
just sort of...dull. Also tacky.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Hss hss hss! Not yet aware of my charms,
are you? Go on then, look into my eyes.
You will see how truly beautiful I am.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Mmm, sorry, but no. The Warden of Lust may
be beautiful, but you aren't him—you must
be some kind of body double or the like.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
But why!? Why isn't my power working!?
You're just an ordinary man! You're nothing!
What is your secret!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Well, since you're an impostor, you better
just give me the key to the Dark Castle.
I mean, we can't have a nobody like you
carrying something like that around.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Excuse me!? That key is proof that
I am the true Warden of Lust!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Which is why you're gonna
hand it over! AROOOOOO!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: Damnation! You're a werewolf!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Where is this stupid key!? Ugh.
The guy must keep it on him.
I gotta get back!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: I've got the key. Let's go.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Henchman_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: Stop right there!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
You take the key and get outta here.
I'll deal with our adoring fans.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Make sure you take me to the
Dark Castle so the Dismal King
can save me. Don't forget!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: I promise I will.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
How did he manage to
get the key, anyway?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
This is the Month of Slumber, my good man—
yet a little bird tells me you have been
laboring the days away instead of sleeping
as you should be. Why is this?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
I'm sorry, milord! It's just that...
Well, we're out of food and we're hungry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text: Are you some kind of fool? You're hungry because you're laboring! Why, oh why, does my sacred rest have to be disturbed by packs of idiots like this? It! Is! So! Infuriating!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
But very well! If you desire to toil so badly,
I'll put you to work in the underground mines.
Your shift runs from midnight to midnight,
every day, until you are dead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wait, no! Please! I'll never work again!
I'll be a regular layabout! Please!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
There can be no clemency for one
who disturbs my slumber. *yaaawn*

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
That is the Warden of Sloth, Master.
He's truly lazy, but doesn't mind
putting others to work. He's also one of the watchtower wardens
with a key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
And he killed me when I tried to get
my hands on his key last time, right?
Let's not have that happen again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text: Of course, Master. Let's do that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
Of course, Master. Let's do thaaa...
Er, wait. Why? If we just 'march in,' 
you're going to get killed again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
Pffft! This guy just sleeps all day!
How hard could it possibly be?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
I think you're right, Master.
Let's go steal it at once!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey there! So explain something to me:
what's the problem with working during
the Month of Slumber?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
The Warden of Sloth has done us a great service
by establishing a month in which none may toil.
The wasting of this blessing is an act that
cannot be permitted to stand!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
I mean, all right. But what's the harm 
if someone just wants to keep working?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
If a person is so insistent on besmirching
the Month of Slumber, they may pursue their
precious work in the underground mines. Those who wish to rest may sleep.
Those who wish to work will labor.
Such is the compassion of the Warden!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Huh. Well, when you put it like that,
the warden doesn't sound so bad.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
What? No! You have to help me!
That's why you're here, right?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: DO I, though? Hmm... Okay, tell you what: you scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours. Do you happen to know any of the warden's weaknesses?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Uhhh... Sure I do! I know 'em all!
Now help me already!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: You can't possibly trust this guy.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: I could use the info. Let's save him.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: Yeah, that sounds fake. See ya!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Come then, my pretty! Oh, but you will
SO enjoy the underground mines!
Aha! Aha! Aaah ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
We march into the Tower of Sloth.
Easy-breezy!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
All right then, buddy!
Spill it with the weaknesses.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
The Warden of Sloth has no weaknesses!
And even if he did, there's no way a lowborn
oaf like me would know anything.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text: Let's send this liar to the mines.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
...Loud noises, got it. I'm not sure that's
useful enough to match my saving your life,
but I guess it's fine. I mean, unless you're
holding out on the real juicy info?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
I'd never hide something from the
woman who saved my life! ...But hey,
look at the time! Gotta go! Oh, and while I don't know what you're
planning, good luck with it anyway.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
I suppose I should have warned them that
entering the tower will make them sleepy...
but after the way they just threatened me,
I think they've earned a little suffering!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Zzz...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Even the guard's asleep.
The Month of Slumber, indeed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Then let's sneak in.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Sheesh, he's a good fit for the
Warden of Sloth! I need to find
a job like this someday.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
*yaaawn* Forgive me, Master...
I'm getting a bit tired...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
*yawn* Oh man, I'm yawning too!
Time to slap our cheeks, stay focused,
and track down that warden!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Looks like he's off in dreamland.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Surprise attack time!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Let's look around a bit.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: I love how you play dirty, Master.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: ABRACA-KILL YOU!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
I had no idea you could
use magic, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Dolores!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
At this rate, we're both going
to fall asleep.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Okay, NOW it's surprise attack time.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Let's keep looking around.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: I agree wholeheartedly.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Mrrrfff...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Eeep. Did he wake up?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: ...Nope. Back to sleep.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: We can take the key now, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Well, that's lucky! Let's grab it
and get outta here while we can.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Who disturbs my slumber!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Man, this guy's a lot
sturdier than I thought.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
You were a fool to attack me in my sleep,
for it is when the Warden of Sloth is at
his most powerful—and by that, I mean
I am completely invincible!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Which meeeans...you're NOT invincible
right now! Ha ha ha! Sucker!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Now fork over the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
I had no reason to fight for true.
Now back to sleep for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Y-you... You're—!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
According to that definitely-trustworthy guy,
the Warden of Sloth hates loud noises.
So if we make some huge noise, we'll be
able to get the key easy as a cupcake.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: WAR WITH THE WARDEN! WAKE UP SLOTH! WAR WITH THE WARDEN! I PLEDGE MY TROTH! DEATH AND BLOOD AND PUS AND PAIN! NOW YOUR MIND HAS GONE INSANE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
Gyaaa! What is this horrific sound!?
This death growl in my head!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: WAR WITH THE WARDEN! GO TO HELL, SLOTH! WAR WITH THE WARDEN! I'M YOUR NEW BOSS! SKULLS AND ICHOR AND GRAVES AND RATS! EVERYONE HATES A BUREAUCRAT! WAR WITH THE WARDEN! BODY IN PAIN! WAR WITH THE WARDEN! SOUL IN TWAIN! SWORDS AND SKIN AND GUTS AND BILE! NOW YOUR CORPSE WILL I DEFILE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
The goddess of death herself has come!
My soul is being torn from my body!
And yet I burn to hear more! More!
MOOOOOOOOOOOORE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
Sure seems like it!
And now, the key. Yoink!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
Uh-oh. Looks like your singing
made us some unexpected fans.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: Did you like my singing, Master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
I hope someday you'll hear
me sing my song of love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
If you liked that, I bet you'll enjoy this
death metal medley even more!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
Leave that to me. If it'll get us a key to
the Dark Castle, I will spare no effort.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
So you're a wolf tamer, then?
And you followed me here on purpose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
I'll call a wolf, so just wait for me
outside the tower. Oh, and don't
worry—I'll get that key for you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
A wolf? Blast, this is no dream.
Time for this bat to fly!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
The Warden of Sloth hates wolves,
apparently. That's good to know.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
Wait, but how did a wolf even get
into the tower? I didn't see one
come through the front gate.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
As this month's grand tournament winner,
your prize is a one-on-one battle with me!
NOW COME AT ME, SON!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
B-but you're the Warden, milord!
There's no way I can beat you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
One blow? Seriously!? How could a weakling like
that have possibly won the grand tournament!?
Who in the blazes is running that thing!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Henchman_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Er, me, milord. But the thing is,
we don't have many participants
because no one wants to face y—

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text: Then it's your job to FIND SOME!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Lasted two blows, did ya?
I sure know how to pick 'em! ...Well, crap. I let my anger get the best
of me, and now I'm down a lackey. Again.
Grrr, but that really fries my eggs!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
That is the Warden of Wrath. He's constantly 
furious, and ever in search of intense combat.
He's also one of the watchtower wardens
with a key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
And he killed me when I tried to get
my hands on his key last time, right?
Let's not have that happen again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
That's... Huh. It's not like you to fight
someone so obsessed with battle head-on.
Couldn't we try to take advantage of his
short fuse or something?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text: Well, I suppose that would be a good chance to show off my witchy skills... Yeah, okay. If you don't think a straight-up brawl is a good idea, we'll try something else.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Fight me, Warden!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
It's about damn time somebody interesting
showed up around here! Let's just hope
you aren't all talk.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, I'm not. And when I win, you hand
over the key to the Dark Castle. Deal?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Agreed. But if I win,
you hand over your LIFE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Looks like you're stronger than I thought.
I'll do you a solid and actually put some
effort into this next one.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Think you can beat me?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Nah, we're done here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Dolores is right. Fighting this guy
head-on is a real bonehead idea.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Running away, is it? Good! I love hunting
down fleeing prey—and I'll hunt ya to the
ends of the damn world!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Takin' off? Good! Get stronger,
then come back! More fun for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Maybe it'd be better to get a key from
one of the other watchtowers first.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
The key you seek is
within that flame.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
It's the fire of my spirit—the fire
of rage. And if you want the key,
you'll have to put out my fire!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Nothing a little bit
of magic can't handle!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: This isn't working. Gotta go!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
My flame grows fiercer! My spirit burns!
I'm grateful to you, but we're not done!
The fight goes OOOOOON!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Good, because I'm burning hot!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Uh-oh. That flame got a little weaker.
Are you starting to worry you could lose?
Has the seed of fear taken root in your heart?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Fear? Bah! My heart contains only rage—
rage at the fact I haven't crushed your
damn bones into dust!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Not done... I'm not done...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Your spirit's already
accepted defeat.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: I'll take the key now, thanks.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Man, those were some fun fights.
Let's go again sometime!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
A fun...fight? Well, I suppose the fires of
my fury may have been somewhat calmed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: You... You're—!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Good thing the warden's not the
fastest guy in the world!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text: Hey, I bet this could be useful...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
How about we hide in it and wait
for Mr. Bad Bull to run past us?
