SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Sure, I guess that could work...
But I was planning something spicier!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Damn! He caught up to us
while we were thinking.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
No! The hunt can't end this quickly!
Keep running! Make this FUN!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
You're talking big, but I'm not sure you can
ACTUALLY catch us. I mean, you're crazy slow!
In fact, it's SO pathetic, I'm just gonna
hold up here and wait for you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Sounds like you're taking me lightly.
LAST MISTAKE YOU'LL EVER MAKE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text: Time for a spell of tripping! Hup!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Wowzers, that went well!
He fell right into the...well.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
You're amazing, Master! You dodged him
AND looked awesome doing it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Sure did. Now let's go look for the key
in the tower while we can.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.text:
We're probably gonna have to face some 
serious power when we open this door.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.text:
Better make sure we're prepared
before we break the seal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.text:
No need for worry so long
as we're prepared!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
So this is the Dark Castle?
Not what I was expecting, actually.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Hear me, O Dismal King! I have fulfilled
my oath and thrown wide the gates of the
Dark Castle! Reveal yourself to us now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Y'know something, Dolores? I think this
place is deserted. I mean, if someone as
powerful as the Dismal King were here,
we'd DEFINITELY be able to tell.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
To think the idiots who opened
this gate would be here...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
And now the truth is known: you'd hoped
to meet the Dismal King, but found only
an empty castle. I hope you are happy.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Yes indeed! The king is gone, and not even
we wardens know where he might be.
Perhaps he fled this life. Perhaps he died.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
We're the damn wardens of the watchtowers!
And while we've taken charge of them from
the king, his absence is still troubling.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
If it were to become known that our lord
has abandoned his castle, the people of
this world would no longer heed us.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
But if they believe we have sealed him away,
they also believe the four of us possess
the strength greater than his own.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Oh, but I'm breaking out in goosebumps
just thinking about what punishment
awaits these interlopers!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Don't worry: the four wardens of the
watchtowers will make sure there are
always pretty flowers on your grave!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
We rid the world of the wardens,
but that doesn't get us any closer
to finding the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
I'm FREE! And so is all of Yomi!
Oh, thank you, Master! Thank you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Well then, you should go enjoy
the heck out of your freedom! As for me, I was hoping the Dismal King
could help me find some cats, but that
didn't really work out the way I expected.
Guess I've still got more to do here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
This is no time for me to relax, Master.
I wish to continue serving at your side,
and also know where we might find a cat!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
No kidding? Wow, I should've just
asked you right from the jump!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: So is that the Dismal King?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: He's a bit different from how I imagined. ...Okay, a lot different. ...Okay, completely different. But yes. That's him.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Hear me, O Dismal King! I have fulfilled
my oath and thrown wide the gates of the
Dark Castle! Please grant my reward now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: How thoughtful.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: The gate's closed!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Oh, but you worked so very hard to meet
the Dismal King! Stay awhile, friends!
Bask in his presence!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King eventually took that form
after repeatedly devouring his subordinates.
Alas, one must always take care not to overeat.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Eventually, the wardens of the seven
watchtowers joined forces to seal
the Dismal King away in his castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
And although three towers and their
wardens fell to ruin, we remaining
four kept watch over the seal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Do enjoy your little tryst
with the Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
You better go hide, Dolores. And as for you,
Dismal King, you're about to get a crash
course in what happens when you mess
with Ameya, witch of Pulchra!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Could it be?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: I'll lend a hand.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Do it! Destroy the Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Keep going! Don't give up!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King is no more...
Time for a nap!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Today calls for a banquet!
We'll all eat until we burst!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
You people can do as you want,
but I will rule over this castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Not so fast there, snake boy!
I'M the new lord of this world!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
A beef-brain like you ruling Yomi?
What a nightmare.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Indeed, a lord must be graceful
and kind—just as I am.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Uh, WE were actually the ones who beat the
Dismal King, remember? A little thank-you
would've been nice.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: ...Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King is dead.
I know we did our best,
but I still can't believe it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Hey, life is filled with things that
don't always go the way we want.
You didn't do anything wrong.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Oh, I'm totally fine! After all,
I've got YOU, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Not your master.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: And we'll keep on keeping on!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
How could you say something so heartless
when I'm trying so hard to act cheerful?
I hate you, Master! I hate you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Well, I suppose it's better this way.
But now, I gotta get to cat-hunting—
and I know just who to ask.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Excuse me! Have you seen
any cats around here?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
You were strong enough to defeat even the
four wardens of the watchtowers—which means
you might be strong enough to seal away
the Dismal King's power!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Yes, we've been searching for powerful
people such as yourselves who might
fight the king in our stead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
That sounds like a 'you guys' problem,
not an 'Ameya' problem. Helpful tip here:
witches of Pulchra do NOT like being used.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Ah, but in reality, YOU are the ones who are
actually facing the dark power of the king—
and if you fight, you will have the full
support of the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Guess I gotta get him before
he gets me. Go hide, Dolores!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Time to RAGE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: A little snack never hurts!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Let's ease down now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Leave this to me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King turned
into a baby!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
It appears his power has been reset.
Good! This should return the flow
of darkness to normal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Wow. I thought you guys imprisoned the
Dismal King so you could have free reign
to do whatever you wanted, but I guess
I was mistaken.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Indeed, for the watchtower wardens
are the guardians of the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Until the king returns to his former self,
let us entrust his care to the maid here.
I assume she will be fine with this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: ARE you fine with that, Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
If it is your wish, Master,
then I will give my all to
raising the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: I really owe you, Dolores. Thanks.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Are you leaving, Master!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Yeah, I've gotta go find some cats.
That's actually why I came here
in the first place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
In that case, you should begin
your search in the tower ruins.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: See!? You really are the best.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
So this is probably a dumb question,
but why is there a baby sitting alone
in the Dismal King's castle?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Ooo, you're a happy wittle baby!
Yes you are!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text: Finally, I am shed of that place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
You two were the ones who brought
me outside of the barrier, yes?
You have my gratitude.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Gratitude? Wait, so does that
mean you're the Dismal King?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Those who address me usually take a knee
or otherwise show deference, but in light
of your recent good work, I'll overlook it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
The barrier on that castle sealed
my power away—hence why I took
on the form of a baby.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
And getting out beyond the barrier means
you've grown into a child? Pretty cool.
Still, I assume that's not your true
'true' form, right?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Of course not. If I can pass beyond the barrier
formed by the watchtowers, I will regain my
true form—but alas, said barrier spans the
entirety of Yomi.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Well then, I've got a solution.
Let's just leave this world!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text: Is such a thing even possible?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
You better believe it! Oh, but I've
got to find a magic cat here first.
Don't suppose you've seen one?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Oooh, so THAT'S where it was!
Well then, let's head back to the
graveyard and leave this place!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Oooh, so THAT'S where it was!
Well then, let's head back to
the well and leave this place!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: There's definitely something here. Something incredibly powerful.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: It is the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Uh, Dolores? You all right th—

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Hear me, O King! I, the Warden of Pride,
have fulfilled my sacred vow! Among all
other wardens, I alone have proven worthy
to stand at your side!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Wait, the Warden of Pride!?
What are you talking about!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
I did not think you would make it here,
Warden of Pride. Your virtue, after all,
is pride—the selfsame quality which makes
you unable to cooperate with others.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
In your arrogance, you played at being queen,
and gloated overmuch of how you surpassed
all other wardens. But I am the Dismal King!
I need no one at my side!
So while you will never admit to such,
you are not worthy to be my queen.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Still, you have my praise for all you have
done up until this point, for I know it must
have been most arduous for one of your
haughty arrogance... Now begone.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Begone? BEGONE? How DARE you say so to me! You, who were trembling in this castle like a miserable cur until I set you free! But fine. If you can't see my true glory, I'll just get rid of you like I did all of the other wardens!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Look, I get that you have a beef with the
Dismal King, but it doesn't really involve me.
I mean, this only started when you mistook
me for your mast...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Oh, duh! I get it now! You wanted me to fight
the wardens FOR you! You just PRETENDED
to be a loyal maid serving her master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Not quite. The Warden of Pride—the TRUE Warden
of Pride—coveted the seat of queen and betrayed
the other wardens. But before she could kill them,
she herself was ended instead. I saw this as a good thing overall,
and replaced the warden with this maid.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
But only after entering this castle did she
fully complete the task I had implanted deep
in her mind. So you see, it was not she who
deceived you, but I.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Enough! I am the Warden of Pride,
and I refuse to stand by and let you
claim you somehow manipulated me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Hah!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Urk!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Nnngh...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Now then. As I know you would never
wish for mercy, I will permit you
to perish along with your pride.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Okay, that's enough!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
I'M Dolores's master, so you can stop
throwing around orders any old time!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
This is no longer the maid you knew as Dolores,
but the Warden of Pride—and what becomes of
her is for the Dismal King alone to decide.
Now remove yourself from my sight!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Hmm... It would seem your determination is
not borne of mere arrogance. Given this,
perhaps it is better for this warden to
serve her master as a maid after all.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
M-Master...? I think I...blacked out.
Oof, and everything hurts...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Well, the Dismal King here was just
praising you for a job well done.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
He...he said that about ME!?
Oh, but that's wonderful!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Now begone, the both of you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Okay, but before we go, there should be
a magic cat somewhere here in Yomi.
Do you know where I could find it?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
A magic cat? It is right here.
Now if your business is concluded,
I say to you again: begone!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Well, look who finally figured it out...
Oh, but my performance was absolutely
RIVETING, wouldn't you say? And while it wouldn't have been difficult
for me to kill the other wardens alone,
I had to save my strength to topple the
Dismal King here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
And as for you, my king...
Bow your head and beg forgiveness!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Wait, so you were planning to
kill the Dismal King all along?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Kill him? I wanted to be his QUEEN!
None but I possess power and beauty
enough to stand at his side!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
And now the Warden of Pride
has become the Dismal Queen. Well, in that case, I have a request:
I'm looking for a magic cat here in Yomi,
and I'd like you to tell me where it is. I mean, that should be pretty easy
for a Dismal Queen to handle, right?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text: Well, guess I'm done here, then.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Wait! Don't just up and leave.
The cat... Er...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
The cat is yours if you fight me!
Yes, that's it! Fight me for it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
You clearly just made that up, Dolores.
I'll find the cat myself, 'kay? Thanks.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
No! I must grant your wish!
I won't stand for any alternatives!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text: Fiiine, let's get it over with.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text: The cat SHOULD be here, but...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text:
You think you can win against me, Master?
The one who took down the Dismal King?
You should be more worried for your LIFE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text:
Wow, you really DID become the boss
around here, huh? And then you granted
my wish and everything!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.text:
Feels like I just met Dolores
here yesterday...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.text:
...I must be hearing things.
Bye, Dolores!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Something seems different
about the Tower of Wrath.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
With the Dismal King released, Master,
you are now seeing Yomi's true form—
as well as the true forms of the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I guess he does look different, huh?
This must be the true Warden of Wrath.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I thought a coward like you might steal
treasures in the Dark Castle, but you went
and released the Dismal King instead...
AND NOW YOU'RE GONNA PAY!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Same great personality on the inside, though.
All right, man, I went easy on you last time,
but if you wanna experience the full power
of my magic, I'm happy to oblige!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Stand down, Warden—unless you are truly
so ignorant of the power I wield?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, I know it well, my king...which is why
I'm gonna stick you back in that castle
and make you a damn baby again!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I must say, you do impress.
It's no mean thing to bring down
the strongest of all wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Seems like he was still hurting from his
little trip down the well. Be nice if it
was always like this...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
When a wise person wishes to avoid
direct conflict, they employ a detour.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, yes... I sense the presence of some
of my thralls, faint though it may be.
Perhaps they have escaped the wary eyes
of the wardens by hiding in the city? Still, I know they will work themselves
to the bone and beyond for my sake.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So it's up to me how we move forward?
Makes me a little nervous, actually.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
So you really think your followers will
'work to the bone and beyond' for you? 
If you ask me, these people don't look
up to opposing the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
They cannot disobey my words,
and would never betray me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Hey, you're the king.
Guess I'll trust you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Full glad am I to come face-to-face
with you, my thralls. I must venture across our lands without drawing
the attention of the wardens, that I might
regain my true strength. As such, I would have
you travel ahead and draw their eyes from us.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wow, they really did it!
How did you do that?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text: Care to try it for yourself?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
No thanks! I'm not much for the whole
'offer up my life to serve' thing.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
There were once a full seven watchtowers in Yomi,
each symbolizing one of the virtues of darkness:
pride, greed, envy, wrath, sloth, gluttony,
and lust. Yet some have now been lost forever.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
These ruins—where the Tower of Pride
once stood—are one such instance. Indeed, you served the Warden of Pride,
maid. Do you remember this?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
I have a vague recollection of working here
a long while ago, but it's...fuzzy. I think it
was from a time before I knew my master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
But if you say it is so, then it must be.
How incredible that you might know so much
about even a base maid like me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I am a hunter paid to track
and kill fell fiends. I have waited long and long for a chance
to hunt the Dismal King, and so followed
you when I heard you left his lair.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I pray you will stay out of my way.
This will be best for all.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text: I need the Dismal King's power.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text: You're more fool than I imagined!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Too bad for you! Also, I've had
just about enough of this hunt.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Master! The Dismal King is
surrounded by fiends!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Fear not, for they are my servants,
and will allow us to avoid the
watchtowers. Now hurry aboard.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Boy, you're sure living up
to your reputation! Thanks!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
You will find your praise unwarranted;
this is far from a gentle ride.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text: You had this thing all ready!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
How could you make such
a cruel choice, Master!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Well, I found the cat I needed,
so it's not like I was under any
obligation to protect the king. Plus, if he's gonna go around calling
himself 'the Dismal King,' he'd damn
well better be able to back that up!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_2.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_2.text:
Oh, and this means I'm also done
pretending to be your master.
Thanks for everything, Dolores!
It was a total blast!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
It's always like this: overly indulging
in sloth always leads to the worst of
all possible outcomes. I can't believe you were enough of an idiot
to take the Dismal King out of his castle!
I really should have taken you more 
seriously when first we met...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
Look, there's no reason to fight now
that you've got your true form back.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text: True form? Are you half asleep!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
Do as she bids, Warden: close the gates
of your tower and go to sleep. Or do
you wish to be subjected to endless
days without rest once more?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
I have a better idea: why don't YOU
go back to the Dark Castle and sleep
as a peaceful little baby? Such sleep is a supreme pleasure only babies
might experience...and it would be a waste
to casually toss such a thing so aside!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
Kinda seems like the wardens don't
realize their forms have changed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
That's because they haven't
changed—Yomi has.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
So what do you intend to do when
you get all your power back?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
You are not of this land;
my actions do not concern you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text: Yeah, but he sucks. Let's fight!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text:
You are more given to fighting
than I first imagined.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text:
The path cleared for us by my thralls
has been closed. We have no choice
but to fight our way through.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_200_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_SLOTH_200_CUT_000.text:
We already avoided this with my flying
conveyance. There is no need to return
to the Tower of Sloth.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_100_CUT_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Lust is freedom, and such a thing runs counter
to command by a regent. Yet because we live in
the world of darkness, we have been ruled by
a king of it. What a contradiction it is.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Lust is true darkness, which means we have no
need of a king. Even with the seven watchtowers
reduced to four, we still managed to oppose
your cruel reign and seal you away.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
This form is the true darkness.
The true Yomi.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
I mean, I get what you're saying,
but I don't think you've actually
realized what's IN its true form
at the moment.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Cast aside your freedom, Warden, for its
lack creates value from desire—and that
is from whence darkness is born.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
It is you who should cast freedom aside,
for the Dismal King ought be the least
liberated of all!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
So when you were a baby, you were free
from the responsibility of being the 
Dismal King? That seems like it
would've been nice, actually.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Alas, it is too late. In the end,
I am the only remaining warden.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Wouldn't it be better to just go back to
your life of eating whatever you want and
stop trying to mess with the Dismal King? I mean, eating like a pig all day
sounds like good times to me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Indeed, if I could live that life,
I would be content—though
'like a pig' takes it a bit far.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Yet I cannot, for if the Dismal King's
rule is restored, I will be forced to eat
for his sake once more, and all will
again taste as ashes in my mouth.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Warden, covet life. You need no purpose.
A reason for living is unnecessary.
Simply hungering for life is the duty
of all subjects of the dark.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
I just want to eat lots of delicious food!
To savor it and not simply throw it down
my gullet like an unthinking machine!
Will you not even allow me that much!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Yikes, man. Life for the subjects
of the dark is ROUGH.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Compared to the toil of their king,
the wardens and their brethren might
as well be sleeping through existence.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
I eat and eat, but still desire more.
Yet when someone tells me I MUST eat, 
I no longer want to. This is what the
presence of the Dismal King means!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
You became a pig because you ate
whatever you wanted. Maybe think
about some self-restraint?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
Eating all one wants is our natural state.
Should doing that cause me to become a pig,
then a pig I shall be.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
Eat, Warden. Eat greedily. Such is your
duty as one of the subjects of the dark.
Eat without rest. Eat without pause.
Devote yourself wholly to the act.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
No! I don't want that! That's exactly what
makes me not want to eat! So I'm going to
make YOU eat, and eat, and eeeat!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
Man, you are just as terrifying
as your name implies.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text: It seems I'm the only one left.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
This is the end of the wardens' rule,
so maybe just give up and beg the
Dismal King for forgiveness? I mean,
you already look half-forgiven as-is.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
Forgiveness? There is no such word in the
Dismal King's lexicon. And I also do not wish
it, for desire is unforgivable by nature.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
We seven wardens staked our existence on the
unforgivable act of sealing away the king.
Setting aside the three towers that are lost,
how can any of us seek forgiveness?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
Ask for my forgiveness, Warden.
The Dismal King alone can grant
you clemency. So ask.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
An invitation so sweet I am seized with the
desire to fall to my knees and kiss your feet.
Indeed, I would entrust my entire body to you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
...But I cannot, for you will simply kick me
while I am on my knees begging forgiveness.
For you are the Dismal King, and even if I
desire you, such lust can never be satisfied.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
You look like some regular kid to me,
but everyone still treats you like the
Dismal King. Frankly, I don't see it,
but maybe the wardens do?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
You have poor eyes. Nothing more.
Do not trouble yourself over it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
We've arrived. And you claim we can
reach the world outside Yomi from here?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: As long as you stick with me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Then let us hurry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
That will not come to pass, for it is
your fate to be hunted down by me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I have no idea who you are, and I really
don't care. Just stay away from the king
unless you wanna enter a world of pain!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I am a hunter paid to track
and kill fell fiends. I have waited a long time for a chance
to hunt the Dismal King, and so followed
you when I heard you left his lair.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I was worried those awful wardens might get
him first, so I appreciate your safeguarding
him all this way. Thanks to you, my hunt will
surely prove a great success!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Gotta say, your thanking me isn't exactly
making me leap for joy. In fact, if you
make it so I've wasted all my time here,
I'm gonna be EXTREMELY annoyed!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
And what exactly are you hoping to accomplish
by taking the Dismal King out of this world?
He lacks anything but the power to bring about
darkness, and his presence benefits none. Instead, let me take him. In this way,
at least my employer and I will benefit.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I didn't protect him all this time for you,
and I'm also not a fan of surprise attacks.
So let the king go. Then we talk.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
You must think me a proper fool!
But no, I'll not let this chance
slip through my fingers.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Bah! Nothing will be settled by standing
about staring daggers at each other!
So very well: I will hear your terms.
Begin the negotiation.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
You're the only one in a hurry here;
the king and I have aaaaaall the time
in the world. Also, the second you give me the chance,
I'm totally taking him back.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Damnable cur!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I have not the patience for such!
I'd rather risk getting killed by you
than risk the king escaping!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: What the...? My leg!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Damn you, Dismal King!
You've risen the dead from their graves!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
The dead are surrounding us
as well, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Damn it all—and damn YOU,
Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: He okay?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Milord!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: ...Oh. He's just sleeping.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Sooo, Dolores? I think that guy might
be right: taking the Dismal King out
of this world could be SUPER dangerous. I mean, the wardens are gone now,
so couldn't he just keep living
in this world as he is?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Master, I...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Can I leave him with you, Dolores?
Will you do that for me?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
If you ask it of me, I will do so gladly.
And in truth, I would be most happy
to serve the Dismal King himself.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Then do that. And...thanks.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Farewell, Master!
I'll never forget you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Now then...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Let's go, milord.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I'm relieved you managed to get past all
those villainous wardens; you would have
faced defeat had you fought them head-on
like an honest fool. You also have my thanks for getting the king
here safely—it was impressive work. And thanks
to that work, my hunt for the Dismal King will
now prove a great success.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I didn't bring him here to make you feel
all warm and fuzzy. He promised to help
me find a magic cat if I protected him. And I intend to do just that, because no
witch worth her salt would ever wield
power gained through betrayal!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Verbal negotiations are concluded.
Now let my strength speak for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
My prey is the Dismal King alone.
I bid you farewell.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
That hunter really did it...
He captured the Dismal King... Oh, but this is the end of Yomi!
I don't know what I should do...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I'm sorry I couldn't protect the Dismal King,
but I have to get my power back—and I'd feel
a whole lot better doing that if I had you
at my side, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I would go anywhere so long as
I can be by your side, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Then let's get the heck
out of this world!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Uh-oh! Looks like someone's
big hunt has come to an end.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
You have done well to aid me,
maid. Live well.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
You don't need a maid around to tend to
your needs, King? I mean, 'cause I bet
Dolores would totally love that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text: Great! Now everybody into the grave!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text: Great! Now everybody into the well!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_010_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_GRAVEYARD_010_CUT.text:
Yes, well done. Now hurry up
and take me to another world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wait, please! I ask that you hear
my request, O Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh hey, it's the wolf tamer!
He helped us rescue you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
What is your request, werewolf? I pray you
will not ask to be freed from your plight, 
for how could I, the Dismal King, permit
you to cast away your innate dark power?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wait, so he's actually a WEREWOLF!?
Man, that's cool.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
I can hide nothing from you, milord:
I do wish to end my time as a werewolf.
I know this to be a wish unbecoming one
of the dark, but ask it of you anyway.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Then I offer two paths: continue living
as a werewolf, or die and be free of it.
Make your decision.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
It is a wise decision to continue in
my service as a subject of the dark.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
I can't believe I'm heading
back INTO a grave...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
Also, I guess that means it's time to say bye.
Thanks for everything, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey, look who it is! You were actually
a HUGE help, so you can follow me
for as long as you want.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
With the Dismal King the way he is,
he won't be able to grant my wish.
There can be no further meaning
in my remaining in this world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
I mean, you seem pretty sure,
but just so you know, there's
a chance you might regret this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
Nay, YOU will be the one with regrets!
Do you not see what he truly is!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.text: Master, wait! Don't leave me behind!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.text:
You wanna go into the
grave with me, Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.text:
No, I don't want to go in a grave...
but I want to be left behind even less!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Can't believe I'm going
back INTO a grave...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_001.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_001.text:
Can't believe I'm jumping
back INTO a well...

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_002.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_002.text:
I should be able to get back
through these ruins.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I guess that means it's time to say bye.
Thanks for everything, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Hey, look who it is! You were actually
a HUGE help, so you can follow me
for as long as you want.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
With the Dismal King the way he is,
he won't be able to grant my wish.
There can be no further meaning
in my remaining in this world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
I mean, you seem pretty sure,
but just so you know, there's
a chance you might regret this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Nay, YOU will be the one with regrets!
Do you not see what he truly is!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
I am a hunter paid to track
and kill fell fiends.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Truth exists regardless of my words.
Simply look, and you will see.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Wait, so he's actually a WEREWOLF!?
Man, that's cool.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text: So he's a wolf. So what?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
In that case, I will handle him.
Thank you for your cooperation.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Take him or don't—it means nothing
to me, and you should do as you please.
The prey I truly seek is not so small a catch.

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Your judgment is unsound. This man
is my prey, and I will never permit him
to leave with you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text: Master, wait! Don't leave me behind!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
You wanna go into the
grave with me, Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
You wanna go into the
well with me, Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
No, I don't want to go in a grave...
but I want to be left behind even less!

SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
No, I don't want to go in a well...
but I want to be left behind even less!
